title: Experienced Support Seeking MATURE Team
body:
Hey Friends! 
With over 7000 games across 4 accounts, i'm genuinely interested in being something better than Silver in 2015. 
Incredible map awareness, proven shot-caller, great communicator and ALWAYS positive, I'd love the opportunity to play with a MATURE team that values fun and objectives over kill chasing and typing 'ez'.
I am a bot lane specialist, preferring support, but am happy to play literally any role, with mid being least preferred.
Captains, please feel free to contact me via this thread, or IGN Juicy Crevice.
Much love!

replies.body: 7000 holy crap how are you still silver

I'm starting to think it's because i'm bad, but I really don't think I am! Perhaps mechanically i'm not up to Diamond standard, but my map/timer awareness, stats knowledge, ability to focus... it's all there, I fully believe I should be at least gold... And I hit Nami bubble with the best of them.
Nah id say youd have the stuff to go up, its just ranked can be hard especially in silver and super especially if you dont have a team/duo

> [{quoted}](name=Charrd,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=XPWM8GTH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-21T04:03:50.445+0000)
>
> 7000 holy crap how are you still silver

b8 thred I r8 88
I have literally no idea what that says.. something about bait?

I added you :) My IGN is Krylo, thread [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/FGzlWGTV-lf-players-to-form-a-team-pref-rank-gold-or-higher)

Be sure to pm me in-client ! : )
